page.title: 05CAIRNEYHILL VILLAGE
page.content: Cairneyhill is an old linear settlement on the main Dunfermline to Kincardine Bridge Road. However in recent years the character of Cairneyhill has been drastically changed with the growth of new housing estates which have brought in large numbers of young married couples and their families. Building is still going on in the village, but problems of drainage, which have in the past caused flooding to a large part of one of the new estates, will probably ensure that little more development will occur. Residents say it is a neighbourly village, and proof of this is shown in their recent efforts to raise thousands of pounds to send a local boy, Ian Skinner, to America, to enable him to have a life saving operation.
